languages.text: {n}Кожа и мышцы расходятся, в ноздри ударяет запах прогорклого мяса. Кляйн опорожняет содержимое желудка через перила палубы. Сдерживая рвотные позывы, вы взираете на тошнотворную мешанину нечеловеческих внутренностей.{/n}

{n}The skin and bones part, and the stench of rancid meat hits your nostrils. Klein empties his stomach over the deck railing. Fighting the urge to vomit yourself, you peer at the vile mass of subhuman entrails.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Кожа и мышцы расходятся, в ноздри ударяет запах прогорклого мяса. Кляйн опорожняет содержимое желудка через перила палубы. Сдерживая рвотные позывы, вы взираете на тошнотворную мешанину нечеловеческих внутренностей.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The skin and bones part, and a smell of rancid meat hits your nostrils. Klein empties his stomach over the deck railing. Fighting the urge to vomit, you look at the revolting mass of subhuman entrails.{/n}

{n}The skin and bones part, and a smell of rancid meat hits your nostrils. Klein empties his stomach over the deck railing. Fighting the urge to vomit, you look at the revolting mass of subhuman entrails.{/n}

{n}The skin and bones part, and the stench of rancid meat hits your nostrils. Klein empties his stomach over the deck railing. Fighting the urge to vomit yourself, you peer at the vile mass of subhuman entrails.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La peau et les os s'écartent, et la puanteur de la viande faisandée vient vous chatouiller les narines. Pris de haut-le-cœur, Klein se penche par-dessus la balustrade du pont pour vomir. Luttant à votre tour contre la nausée, vous observez la masse informe d'entrailles sous-humaines.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The skin and bones part, and the stench of rancid meat hits your nostrils. Klein empties his stomach over the deck railing. Fighting the urge to vomit yourself, you peer at the vile mass of subhuman entrails.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La peau et les os s'écartent, et la puanteur de la viande faisandée vient vous chatouiller les narines. Pris de haut-le-cœur, Klein se penche par-dessus la balustrade du pont pour vomir. Luttant à votre tour contre la nausée, vous observez la masse informe d'entrailles sous-humaines.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Separas la piel y los huesos y el hedor de la carne rancia inunda tu nariz. Klein vacía el estómago por la pasarela. Luchando contra tus propias ansias de vomitar, contemplas la inmunda masa de entrañas subhumanas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The skin and bones part, and the stench of rancid meat hits your nostrils. Klein empties his stomach over the deck railing. Fighting the urge to vomit yourself, you peer at the vile mass of subhuman entrails.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Separas la piel y los huesos y el hedor de la carne rancia inunda tu nariz. Klein vacía el estómago por la pasarela. Luchando contra tus propias ansias de vomitar, contemplas la inmunda masa de entrañas subhumanas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}解剖刀划过的地方骨肉分离，一股腐肉的恶臭扑面而来。克莱因靠在甲板栏杆上，吐得稀里哗啦。你克制着呕吐的冲动，凝视着那团令人作呕的内脏。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The skin and bones part, and the stench of rancid meat hits your nostrils. Klein empties his stomach over the deck railing. Fighting the urge to vomit yourself, you peer at the vile mass of subhuman entrails.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}解剖刀划过的地方骨肉分离，一股腐肉的恶臭扑面而来。克莱因靠在甲板栏杆上，吐得稀里哗啦。你克制着呕吐的冲动，凝视着那团令人作呕的内脏。{/n}

languages.text: {n}皮と骨が離れ、腐った肉の悪臭が鼻孔をつく。クラインはデッキの手すり越しに吐いた。あなた自身も嘔吐したい衝動に駆られながら、人間以下の下劣な内臓の塊を覗き込む。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The skin and bones part, and the stench of rancid meat hits your nostrils. Klein empties his stomach over the deck railing. Fighting the urge to vomit yourself, you peer at the vile mass of subhuman entrails.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}皮と骨が離れ、腐った肉の悪臭が鼻孔をつく。クラインはデッキの手すり越しに吐いた。あなた自身も嘔吐したい衝動に駆られながら、人間以下の下劣な内臓の塊を覗き込む。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Haut und die Knochen lösen sich voneinander, und ein Gestank von fauligem Fleisch schießt dir in die Nase. Klein entleert seinen Mageninhalt über die Deckreling. Du unterdrückst deinen eigenen Brechreiz und studierst die widerwärtige Masse untermenschlicher Eingeweide.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The skin and bones part, and the stench of rancid meat hits your nostrils. Klein empties his stomach over the deck railing. Fighting the urge to vomit yourself, you peer at the vile mass of subhuman entrails.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Haut und die Knochen lösen sich voneinander, und ein Gestank von fauligem Fleisch schießt dir in die Nase. Klein entleert seinen Mageninhalt über die Deckreling. Du unterdrückst deinen eigenen Brechreiz und studierst die widerwärtige Masse untermenschlicher Eingeweide.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Deri ve kemikler birbirinden ayrılıyor. Ekşimiş etin leş gibi kokusu, burun deliklerine hücum ediyor. Klein, güverte tırabzanından istifra ediyor. Sen de istifra etme dürtüsüyle savaşırken insanlık dışı habis iç organ yığınına dikkatle bakıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The skin and bones part, and the stench of rancid meat hits your nostrils. Klein empties his stomach over the deck railing. Fighting the urge to vomit yourself, you peer at the vile mass of subhuman entrails.{/n}
